/opt/gcc-4.8.3/bin/c++    -fexceptions -pedantic -Wall -Wextra -Wundef -Wcast-align -Wchar-subscripts -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Wunused-local-typedefs -Wpointer-arith -Wwrite-strings -Wformat-security -Wno-psabi -Wno-variadic-macros -Wno-long-long -fno-check-new -fno-common -fstrict-aliasing -ansi  -g2 -g0 -O2  -fno-inline-functions    CMakeFiles/adjoint_4.dir/adjoint.cpp.o  -o adjoint_4 -rdynamic
